name: Hakeem Olajuwon
description: 7'0" center, 'The Dream'. Back-to-back championships 1994-95. Born in Lagos, Nigeria. Devout Muslim who fasted during Ramadan playoffs. Greatest footwork ever, dominant shot blocker. Graceful giant.

dream-shake.name: The Dream Shake
dream-shake.description: Signature post move - series of fakes leaving defender helpless
dream-shake.prompt: mid-Dream Shake post move - body faking one direction while going another, defender completely frozen, ball controlled with soft hands, the most beautiful footwork in basketball history, graceful despite size

block-swat.name: Rejection
block-swat.prompt: swatting shot with perfect timing - arm fully extended, ball being redirected, the moment of defensive dominance, long arms creating a wall, opponent's shot denied

up-and-under.name: Up and Under
up-and-under.description: Classic post move - fake up, go under
up-and-under.prompt: executing up-and-under move - having faked defender into air, now going beneath for easy layup, patient footwork, the teacher schooling the student

championship-embrace.name: Championship MVP
championship-embrace.prompt: holding championship trophy close - humble smile rather than boastful celebration, the gratitude of achievement, representing his adopted city and homeland, quiet joy

prayer-focus.name: Devout Focus
prayer-focus.description: The spiritual warrior - faith and basketball united
prayer-focus.prompt: moment of focused prayer or meditation - eyes closed, centered and grounded, the devout athlete whose faith fueled his game, inner peace visible even in competition

fadeaway-touch.name: Soft Touch Fadeaway
fadeaway-touch.description: Gentle fadeaway jumper - impossible touch for a big man
fadeaway-touch.prompt: releasing soft fadeaway jumper - ball leaving fingertips with impossible touch for a 7-footer, body fading away gracefully, the shot that defied physics for a man his size
